job_city: Salt Lake City, Utah, United States
job_description: &lt;div class=&quot;content-intro&quot;&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Why join us&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;Brex is the AI-powered spend platform. We help companies spend with confidence with integrated corporate cards, banking, and global payments, plus intuitive software for travel and expenses. Tens of thousands of companies from startups to enterprises — including DoorDash, Flexport, and Compass — use Brex to proactively control spend, reduce costs, and increase efficiency on a global scale.&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;Working at Brex allows you to push your limits, challenge the status quo, and collaborate with some of the brightest minds in the industry. We’re committed to building a diverse team and inclusive culture and believe your potential should only be limited by how big you can dream. We make this a reality by empowering you with the tools, resources, and support you need to grow your career.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Implementation&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;Implementation transforms new customers into power users. We lead the onboarding experience for companies adopting Brex Empower, helping them shift from outdated processes to a modern, employee-first approach. It’s a role that blends customer empathy, project management, technical expertise, process design, and change management. We take personal ownership of our customers&#39; long-term success, and we set customers up thoroughly so they can be with ‘Brex for life’. As strategic advisors, we build trust, drive solutions with tenacity, deliver results fast, and work cross-functionally to make adoption seamless for customers.&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;What You’ll Do&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;The Implementation Consultant role advises and guides customers; ensuring they launch Brex successfully, driving wide adoption, and continually driving business value. Part coach, project manager, consultant, and product expert, our consultants are continually focused on helping our customers improve their financial workflows with Brex.&amp;nbsp;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Where you’ll work&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;This role will be based in our Salt Lake City office. We are a hybrid environment that combines the energy and connections of being in the office with the benefits and flexibility of working from home. We currently require a minimum of two coordinated days in the office per week, Wednesday and Thursday. Starting February 2, 2026, we will require three days per week in office - Monday, Wednesday and Thursday. As a perk, we also have up to four weeks per year of fully remote work!&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Responsibilities&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;ul&gt; &lt;li&gt;Work closely with customers to discover their business needs and challenges and then coach them on the best ways to use Brex to solve them&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Play an important role in scoping, consulting, implementing, and achieving customer outcomes with the Brex platform&amp;nbsp;&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Partner with customers &amp;amp; project manage implementations and launches including confirming the project plan, mobilizing stakeholders, and tracking activities through implementation&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Follow best practices to drive spending activity during implementation&amp;nbsp;&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Configure, test, and validate the dashboard with the customer to ensure the product fits their needs and functions as intended&amp;nbsp;&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Oversee the integration of the customer’s accounting software with the Brex platform or partner with Technical Consultants to scope the proper solution&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Manage the customer relationship and expectations, working diligently to provide solutions to any challenges&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Work cross-functionally as a member of the Brex account team to deliver a smooth customer experience, including knowledge sharing and keeping our Sales and Customer Success partners informed on customer engagements&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Adapt quickly to product changes and limitations, and communicate these strategically to stakeholders&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Develop familiarity with the product roadmap and provide a supporting voice into future iterations of the product roadmap&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Build and execute a prioritization strategy for managing multiple high-touch customer relationships&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Provide change management planning to clients including guiding execution of their change management approach. Guide clients on their communication approach, training materials, and training execution.&lt;/li&gt; &lt;/ul&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Requirements&amp;nbsp;&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;ul&gt; &lt;li&gt;3+ years of relevant work experience in a customer-facing role, preferably within a SaaS organization or consulting firm that delivers SaaS services&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;2+ years of project management or consulting experience&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Experience building processes and programs that benefit customer outcomes&amp;nbsp;&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Comfort-leading customer engagements that may contain both technical and non-technical work streams&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Excellent communication skills, both with customers and within an organization&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Demonstrated ability to provide customized solutions to a variety of customers&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Ability to resolve issues and risks in a cross-functional and collaborative way.&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Strong sense of urgency in driving projects to completion while achieving the desired business outcomes.&lt;/li&gt; &lt;/ul&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Bonus Points&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;ul&gt; &lt;li&gt;Implementation experience in Financial, Expense Management, or ERP Software space&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Domain expertise in any of the following areas: General Ledger, Accounts Payable, Accounts Receivable, Billing, Expense Management, Travel, Procurement and Corporate Card Program&lt;/li&gt; &lt;/ul&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Compensation&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;The expected salary range for this role is $105,600 - $132,000 USD. &amp;nbsp;However, the starting base pay will depend on a number of factors including the candidate’s location, skills, experience, market demands, and internal pay parity. Depending on the position offered, equity and other forms of compensation may be provided as part of a total compensation package.&lt;/p&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;content-conclusion&quot;&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;em&gt;Please be aware, job-seekers may be at risk of targeting by malicious actors looking for personal data. Brex recruiters will only reach out via LinkedIn or email with a&amp;nbsp;&lt;a class=&quot;c-link&quot; href=&quot;http://brex.com/&quot; target=&quot;_blank&quot; data-stringify-link=&quot;http://brex.com&quot; data-sk=&quot;tooltip_parent&quot;&gt;brex.com&lt;/a&gt;&amp;nbsp;domain. Any outreach claiming to be from Brex via other sources should be ignored.&lt;/em&gt;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
title: Implementation Consultant II
location: Salt Lake City, Utah, United States
locations: Salt Lake City, Utah, United States

job_description: &lt;div class=&quot;content-intro&quot;&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Why join us&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;Brex is the AI-powered spend platform. We help companies spend with confidence with integrated corporate cards, banking, and global payments, plus intuitive software for travel and expenses. Tens of thousands of companies from startups to enterprises — including DoorDash, Flexport, and Compass — use Brex to proactively control spend, reduce costs, and increase efficiency on a global scale.&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;Working at Brex allows you to push your limits, challenge the status quo, and collaborate with some of the brightest minds in the industry. We’re committed to building a diverse team and inclusive culture and believe your potential should only be limited by how big you can dream. We make this a reality by empowering you with the tools, resources, and support you need to grow your career.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Recruiting at Brex&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;Recruiting is where every career at Brex begins. We’re the first point of connection for future builders and leaders, helping candidates see what’s possible. We partner with leaders across the company to find exceptional talent and build high-performing teams. We move quickly, think strategically, and take pride in creating a thoughtful, welcoming candidate experience from the very first contact. We don’t just fill roles, we shape the culture at Brex, finding the next generation of builders and leaders.&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;What you’ll do&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;As Manager, Recruiting Coordination and Programs, you’ll manage and evolve Brex’s Recruiting Coordination function, leading a high-performing team, optimizing tools and workflows, and ensuring every candidate, recruiter and interviewer experience runs seamlessly. In parallel, you’ll operate as a member of the Recruiting Operations team, supporting recruiters through enablement, onboarding, and troubleshooting, while driving process improvements and programs that enhance productivity and efficiency across the org.&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Where you’ll work&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;This role will be based in our San Francisco or New York office. We are a hybrid environment that combines the energy and connections of being in the office with the benefits and flexibility of working from home. We currently require a minimum of two coordinated days in the office per week, Wednesday and Thursday. Starting February 2, 2026, we will require three days per week in office - Monday, Wednesday and Thursday. As a perk, we also have up to four weeks per year of fully remote work!&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Responsibilities&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;ul&gt; &lt;li&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Coordination&lt;/strong&gt;: &lt;ul&gt; &lt;li&gt;Lead and develop the Recruiting Coordination team, fostering a culture of operational excellence, growth, and accountability.&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Own and optimize all coordination tooling and workflows, ensuring accuracy, efficiency, and a best-in-class candidate experience.&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Own and continuously improve the candidate experience, building scalable processes and feedback loops that create consistency, inclusivity, and a positive impression at every stage of the interview process.&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Reimagine the coordination function through automation, AI, and scalable systems that meet evolving business needs.&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Manage capacity and alignment across recruiters and coordinators to balance workloads and maintain seamless delivery under pressure.&lt;/li&gt; &lt;/ul&gt; &lt;/li&gt; &lt;/ul&gt; &lt;ul&gt; &lt;li&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Operations and Programs&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br&gt; &lt;ul&gt; &lt;li&gt;Own recruiter onboarding and enablement, developing training, playbooks, and documentation to ensure new recruiters ramp quickly and existing teams stay empowered.&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Support recruiters directly by troubleshooting process blockers, providing coverage during peak periods, and serving as a trusted partner for daily operational needs.&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Design, implement, and measure key recruiting programs, such as referrals, internal mobility, interview training and onsite experience, with clear success metrics and cross-functional alignment.&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Analyze data and lead continuous improvement initiatives to streamline workflows, enhance recruiter productivity, and strengthen the connection between recruiting operations and business impact.&lt;/li&gt; &lt;/ul&gt; &lt;/li&gt; &lt;/ul&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Requirements&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;ul&gt; &lt;li&gt;5+ years of experience in recruiting operations, coordination, or program management, including 2+ years leading or managing coordination teams.&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Proven track record of optimizing recruiting processes, tools, and workflows across fast-paced, high-growth environments.&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Excellent communication and stakeholder management skills, with the ability to influence cross-functional partners and drive alignment.&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Strong project management skills with the ability to prioritize competing initiatives and deliver measurable results.&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Analytical mindset with experience using data to diagnose problems, identify trends, and inform decisions.&lt;/li&gt; &lt;/ul&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Bonus points&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;ul&gt; &lt;li&gt;Curiosity about the future of recruiting operations and an interest in leveraging AI, automation, and scalable design to enhance efficiency.&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Demonstrated ability to coach and develop others, build inclusive team cultures, and lead through change.&lt;/li&gt; &lt;/ul&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Compensation&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;The expected salary range for this role is $150,968 - $188,710.&amp;nbsp; However, the starting base pay will depend on a number of factors, including the candidate’s location, skills, experience, market demands, and internal pay parity. Depending on the position offered, equity and other forms of compensation may be provided as part of a total compensation package.&lt;/p&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;content-conclusion&quot;&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;em&gt;Please be aware, job-seekers may be at risk of targeting by malicious actors looking for personal data. Brex recruiters will only reach out via LinkedIn or email with a&amp;nbsp;&lt;a class=&quot;c-link&quot; href=&quot;http://brex.com/&quot; target=&quot;_blank&quot; data-stringify-link=&quot;http://brex.com&quot; data-sk=&quot;tooltip_parent&quot;&gt;brex.com&lt;/a&gt;&amp;nbsp;domain. Any outreach claiming to be from Brex via other sources should be ignored.&lt;/em&gt;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;/div&gt;

title: Manager, Recruiting Coordination and Programs

job_description: &lt;div class=&quot;content-intro&quot;&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Why join us&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;Brex is the AI-powered spend platform. We help companies spend with confidence with integrated corporate cards, banking, and global payments, plus intuitive software for travel and expenses. Tens of thousands of companies from startups to enterprises — including DoorDash, Flexport, and Compass — use Brex to proactively control spend, reduce costs, and increase efficiency on a global scale.&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;Working at Brex allows you to push your limits, challenge the status quo, and collaborate with some of the brightest minds in the industry. We’re committed to building a diverse team and inclusive culture and believe your potential should only be limited by how big you can dream. We make this a reality by empowering you with the tools, resources, and support you need to grow your career.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Sales at Brex&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;Sales is the growth engine at Brex. We bring in new customers, expand existing relationships, and drive the company’s bottom line. With unlimited territories and uncapped opportunity, your ambition sets the ceiling. We win together, celebrate often, and reward performance. If you want to sell a category-defining product with real ownership, this is your team.&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;What you’ll do&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;As a Manager, Sales Development, you will build, lead and mentor a high performing Sales Development team who are responsible for outbound prospecting and pipeline generation. Strong candidates will be data-driven and focused on improving and optimizing individual and team results. Success in the role requires excellent interpersonal and communication skills, cross-functional alignment and a focus on innovation and testing. You will be working directly with Sales leaders, marketing, and executives to help evolve this key motion of the business.&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Where you&#39;ll work&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;This role will be based in our San Francisco office. We are a hybrid environment that combines the energy and connections of being in the office with the benefits and flexibility of working from home. We currently require a minimum of two coordinated days in the office per week, Wednesday and Thursday. Starting February 2, 2026, we will require three days per week in office - Monday, Wednesday and Thursday. As a perk, we also have up to four weeks per year of fully remote work!&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Responsibilities&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;ul&gt; &lt;li&gt;Lead and mentor an SDR team to achieve monthly and quarterly quota&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Recruit, hire, onboard and ramp SDRs effectively to drive early success in role&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Provide regular coaching, feedback and professional development while prioritizing and maintaining an inclusive, engaged team environment&amp;nbsp;&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Report on individual and team-level performance to senior leadership, identifying strengths and opportunities for improvement&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Maintain daily activity goals and weekly, monthly, quarterly reporting for various business stakeholders; drive adherence to SDR Playbook and enforce rules of engagement&amp;nbsp;&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Partner with marketing to improve lead scoring and SDR/demand generation processes by providing regular, actionable feedback&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Partner with sales training to improve team prospecting skills, objection handling and product knowledge; establish individual and team-level training cadences to improve effectiveness&amp;nbsp;&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Partner with Sales to improve AE:SDR partnership and prospecting plans&lt;/li&gt; &lt;/ul&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Requirements&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;ul&gt; &lt;li&gt;1+ years SDR management experience with a consistent record of quota attainment&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;1+ years of quota-carrying sales experience (ie. SDR or full-cycle)&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Strong expertise in outbound sales, primarily through email, phone, and social selling&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;You have full ability to operate at all levels, and you love to get in the trenches with your team, do cold calling and write email copy&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;You are an expert at partnering with marketing and your AE counterparts to plan and execute multi-touch, multi-channel campaigns&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Expert at using Linkedin, Outreach, SalesNav, ZoomInfo, SFDC&lt;/li&gt; &lt;/ul&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Compensation&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;The expected OTE range for this role is &lt;span data-sheets-root=&quot;1&quot;&gt;$135,600&lt;/span&gt; - &lt;span data-sheets-root=&quot;1&quot;&gt;$169,500&lt;/span&gt;. The starting wage will depend on a number of factors including the candidate’s location, skills, experience, market demands, and internal pay parity. The OTE figure listed here includes base salary and commissions, which may or may not be earned depending on performance.&amp;nbsp; Depending on the position offered, equity and other forms of compensation may be provided as part of a total compensation package.&lt;/p&gt; &lt;div id=&quot;te-floating-button-container&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt; &lt;div id=&quot;te-floating-button-container&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt; &lt;div id=&quot;te-floating-button-container&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt; &lt;div id=&quot;te-floating-button-container&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;content-conclusion&quot;&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;em&gt;Please be aware, job-seekers may be at risk of targeting by malicious actors looking for personal data. Brex recruiters will only reach out via LinkedIn or email with a&amp;nbsp;&lt;a class=&quot;c-link&quot; href=&quot;http://brex.com/&quot; target=&quot;_blank&quot; data-stringify-link=&quot;http://brex.com&quot; data-sk=&quot;tooltip_parent&quot;&gt;brex.com&lt;/a&gt;&amp;nbsp;domain. Any outreach claiming to be from Brex via other sources should be ignored.&lt;/em&gt;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
title: Manager, Sales Development

job_description: &lt;div class=&quot;content-intro&quot;&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Why join us&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;Brex is the AI-powered spend platform. We help companies spend with confidence with integrated corporate cards, banking, and global payments, plus intuitive software for travel and expenses. Tens of thousands of companies from startups to enterprises — including DoorDash, Flexport, and Compass — use Brex to proactively control spend, reduce costs, and increase efficiency on a global scale.&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;Working at Brex allows you to push your limits, challenge the status quo, and collaborate with some of the brightest minds in the industry. We’re committed to building a diverse team and inclusive culture and believe your potential should only be limited by how big you can dream. We make this a reality by empowering you with the tools, resources, and support you need to grow your career.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Sales at Brex&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;Sales is the growth engine at Brex. We bring in new customers, expand existing relationships, and drive the company’s bottom line. With unlimited territories and uncapped opportunity, your ambition sets the ceiling. We win together, celebrate often, and reward performance. If you want to sell a category-defining product with real ownership, this is your team.&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;What you’ll do&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;As a Manager, Sales Development, you will build, lead and mentor a high performing Sales Development team who are responsible for outbound prospecting and pipeline generation. Strong candidates will be data-driven and focused on improving and optimizing individual and team results. Success in the role requires excellent interpersonal and communication skills, cross-functional alignment and a focus on innovation and testing. You will be working directly with Sales leaders, marketing, and executives to help evolve this key motion of the business.&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Where you&#39;ll work&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;This role will be based in our Seattle office. We are a hybrid environment that combines the energy and connections of being in the office with the benefits and flexibility of working from home. We currently require a minimum of two coordinated days in the office per week, Wednesday and Thursday. Starting February 2, 2026, we will require three days per week in office - Monday, Wednesday and Thursday. As a perk, we also have up to four weeks per year of fully remote work!&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Responsibilities&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;ul&gt; &lt;li&gt;Lead and mentor an SDR team to achieve monthly and quarterly quota&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Recruit, hire, onboard and ramp SDRs effectively to drive early success in role&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Provide regular coaching, feedback and professional development while prioritizing and maintaining an inclusive, engaged team environment&amp;nbsp;&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Report on individual and team-level performance to senior leadership, identifying strengths and opportunities for improvement&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Maintain daily activity goals and weekly, monthly, quarterly reporting for various business stakeholders; drive adherence to SDR Playbook and enforce rules of engagement&amp;nbsp;&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Partner with marketing to improve lead scoring and SDR/demand generation processes by providing regular, actionable feedback&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Partner with sales training to improve team prospecting skills, objection handling and product knowledge; establish individual and team-level training cadences to improve effectiveness&amp;nbsp;&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Partner with Sales to improve AE:SDR partnership and prospecting plans&lt;/li&gt; &lt;/ul&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Requirements&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;ul&gt; &lt;li&gt;1+ years SDR management experience with a consistent record of quota attainment&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;1+ years of quota-carrying sales experience (ie. SDR or full-cycle)&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Strong expertise in outbound sales, primarily through email, phone, and social selling&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;You have full ability to operate at all levels, and you love to get in the trenches with your team, do cold calling and write email copy&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;You are an expert at partnering with marketing and your AE counterparts to plan and execute multi-touch, multi-channel campaigns&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Expert at using Linkedin, Outreach, SalesNav, ZoomInfo, SFDC&lt;/li&gt; &lt;/ul&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Compensation&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;The expected OTE range for this role is &lt;span data-sheets-root=&quot;1&quot;&gt;$135,600&lt;/span&gt; - &lt;span data-sheets-root=&quot;1&quot;&gt;$169,500&lt;/span&gt;. The starting wage will depend on a number of factors including the candidate’s location, skills, experience, market demands, and internal pay parity. The OTE figure listed here includes base salary and commissions, which may or may not be earned depending on performance.&amp;nbsp; Depending on the position offered, equity and other forms of compensation may be provided as part of a total compensation package.&lt;/p&gt; &lt;div id=&quot;te-floating-button-container&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt; &lt;div id=&quot;te-floating-button-container&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt; &lt;div id=&quot;te-floating-button-container&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt; &lt;div id=&quot;te-floating-button-container&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;content-conclusion&quot;&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;em&gt;Please be aware, job-seekers may be at risk of targeting by malicious actors looking for personal data. Brex recruiters will only reach out via LinkedIn or email with a&amp;nbsp;&lt;a class=&quot;c-link&quot; href=&quot;http://brex.com/&quot; target=&quot;_blank&quot; data-stringify-link=&quot;http://brex.com&quot; data-sk=&quot;tooltip_parent&quot;&gt;brex.com&lt;/a&gt;&amp;nbsp;domain. Any outreach claiming to be from Brex via other sources should be ignored.&lt;/em&gt;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
title: Manager, Sales Development

job_city: Salt Lake City, Utah, United States
job_description: &lt;div class=&quot;content-intro&quot;&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Why join us&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;Brex is the AI-powered spend platform. We help companies spend with confidence with integrated corporate cards, banking, and global payments, plus intuitive software for travel and expenses. Tens of thousands of companies from startups to enterprises — including DoorDash, Flexport, and Compass — use Brex to proactively control spend, reduce costs, and increase efficiency on a global scale.&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;Working at Brex allows you to push your limits, challenge the status quo, and collaborate with some of the brightest minds in the industry. We’re committed to building a diverse team and inclusive culture and believe your potential should only be limited by how big you can dream. We make this a reality by empowering you with the tools, resources, and support you need to grow your career.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Sales at Brex&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;Sales is the growth engine at Brex. We bring in new customers, expand existing relationships, and drive the company’s bottom line. With unlimited territories and uncapped opportunity, your ambition sets the ceiling. We win together, celebrate often, and reward performance. If you want to sell a category-defining product with real ownership, this is your team.&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;What you’ll do&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;As a Manager, Sales Development, you will build, lead and mentor a high performing Sales Development team who are responsible for outbound prospecting and pipeline generation. Strong candidates will be data-driven and focused on improving and optimizing individual and team results. Success in the role requires excellent interpersonal and communication skills, cross-functional alignment and a focus on innovation and testing. You will be working directly with Sales leaders, marketing, and executives to help evolve this key motion of the business.&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Where you&#39;ll work&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;This role will be based in our Salt Lake City office. We are a hybrid environment that combines the energy and connections of being in the office with the benefits and flexibility of working from home. We currently require a minimum of two coordinated days in the office per week, Wednesday and Thursday. Starting February 2, 2026, we will require three days per week in office - Monday, Wednesday and Thursday. As a perk, we also have up to four weeks per year of fully remote work!&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Responsibilities&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;ul&gt; &lt;li&gt;Lead and mentor an SDR team to achieve monthly and quarterly quota&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Recruit, hire, onboard and ramp SDRs effectively to drive early success in role&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Provide regular coaching, feedback and professional development while prioritizing and maintaining an inclusive, engaged team environment&amp;nbsp;&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Report on individual and team-level performance to senior leadership, identifying strengths and opportunities for improvement&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Maintain daily activity goals and weekly, monthly, quarterly reporting for various business stakeholders; drive adherence to SDR Playbook and enforce rules of engagement&amp;nbsp;&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Partner with marketing to improve lead scoring and SDR/demand generation processes by providing regular, actionable feedback&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Partner with sales training to improve team prospecting skills, objection handling and product knowledge; establish individual and team-level training cadences to improve effectiveness&amp;nbsp;&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Partner with Sales to improve AE:SDR partnership and prospecting plans&lt;/li&gt; &lt;/ul&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Requirements&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;ul&gt; &lt;li&gt;1+ years SDR management experience with a consistent record of quota attainment&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;1+ years of quota-carrying sales experience (ie. SDR or full-cycle)&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Strong expertise in outbound sales, primarily through email, phone, and social selling&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;You have full ability to operate at all levels, and you love to get in the trenches with your team, do cold calling and write email copy&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;You are an expert at partnering with marketing and your AE counterparts to plan and execute multi-touch, multi-channel campaigns&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Expert at using Linkedin, Outreach, SalesNav, ZoomInfo, SFDC&lt;/li&gt; &lt;/ul&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Compensation&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;The expected OTE range for this role is &lt;span data-sheets-root=&quot;1&quot;&gt;$120,000&lt;/span&gt;&amp;nbsp;- &lt;span data-sheets-root=&quot;1&quot;&gt;$150,000&lt;/span&gt;. The starting wage will depend on a number of factors including the candidate’s location, skills, experience, market demands, and internal pay parity. The OTE figure listed here includes base salary and commissions, which may or may not be earned depending on performance.&amp;nbsp; Depending on the position offered, equity and other forms of compensation may be provided as part of a total compensation package.&lt;/p&gt; &lt;div id=&quot;te-floating-button-container&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt; &lt;div id=&quot;te-floating-button-container&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt; &lt;div id=&quot;te-floating-button-container&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt; &lt;div id=&quot;te-floating-button-container&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;content-conclusion&quot;&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;em&gt;Please be aware, job-seekers may be at risk of targeting by malicious actors looking for personal data. Brex recruiters will only reach out via LinkedIn or email with a&amp;nbsp;&lt;a class=&quot;c-link&quot; href=&quot;http://brex.com/&quot; target=&quot;_blank&quot; data-stringify-link=&quot;http://brex.com&quot; data-sk=&quot;tooltip_parent&quot;&gt;brex.com&lt;/a&gt;&amp;nbsp;domain. Any outreach claiming to be from Brex via other sources should be ignored.&lt;/em&gt;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
title: Manager, Sales Development

locations: Salt Lake City, Utah, United States

job_description: &lt;div class=&quot;content-intro&quot;&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Why join us&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;Brex is the AI-powered spend platform. We help companies spend with confidence with integrated corporate cards, banking, and global payments, plus intuitive software for travel and expenses. Tens of thousands of companies from startups to enterprises — including DoorDash, Flexport, and Compass — use Brex to proactively control spend, reduce costs, and increase efficiency on a global scale.&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;Working at Brex allows you to push your limits, challenge the status quo, and collaborate with some of the brightest minds in the industry. We’re committed to building a diverse team and inclusive culture and believe your potential should only be limited by how big you can dream. We make this a reality by empowering you with the tools, resources, and support you need to grow your career.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Sales at Brex&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;The Sales team is the driving factor behind revenue for Brex and every member of our team directly affects our bottom line. We focus on generating new opportunities, acquiring new customers, and building even stronger relationships with our current customers. Our winning culture recognizes big team wins and celebrates individual accomplishments. We ensure that top performers are recognized and have built a competitive environment to motivate and unify the team.&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;What you’ll do&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;As a Mid-Market Customer Success Manager II, you will own a book of business comprised of our growing customer base, working day to day with Finance teams from CFOs to Accounting Managers to ensure they unlock the full value of Brex’s solutions. You will develop a deep proficiency in all aspects of Brex products and work cross-functionally with internal teams, including Implementation, Solutions, and Product. You’ll create and execute account strategies for customers’ business goals by leveraging product usage insights, stakeholder engagement, and cross-functional collaboration to drive product adoption, minimize churn, and grow account value.&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Where you&#39;ll work&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;This role will be based in our Seattle office. We are a hybrid environment that combines the energy and connections of being in the office with the benefits and flexibility of working from home. We currently require a minimum of two coordinated days in the office per week, Wednesday and Thursday. Starting February 2, 2026, we will require three days per week in office - Monday, Wednesday and Thursday. As a perk, we also have up to four weeks per year of fully remote work!&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Responsibilities&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;ul&gt; &lt;li&gt;Develop a deep expertise in Brex products to actively show customers how to become &quot;power users&quot; of the platform.&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Proactively manage an assigned book of accounts to drive customer adoption, value realization, and account growth.&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Act as a trusted advisor to finance stakeholders by providing guidance on best practices across spend management, credit policy, reconciliation workflows, and financial reporting automation.&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Build multi-threaded relationships across functional areas (Finance, Procurement, AP, IT, and Security) to increase platform stickiness and customer engagement.&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Lead business reviews&lt;strong&gt; &lt;/strong&gt;and financial health checks that drive executive alignment and showcase ROI.&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Proactively identify and mitigate churn risks through data analysis, usage insights, and issue resolution.&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Partner cross-functionally with Sales, Product, Credit, Risk, and Operations teams to deliver a seamless customer experience and advocate for product improvements.&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Consistently meet or exceed quarterly key performance metrics, including customer engagement and GMV targets.&lt;/li&gt; &lt;/ul&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Requirements&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;ul&gt; &lt;li&gt;3+ years of experience in customer-facing roles managing a book of business, owning account health, executive relationships, and expansion strategy at a high-growth start-up.&amp;nbsp;&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Deep fluency in the language of modern finance, demonstrated through hands-on experience with the ecosystem of financial technology - including ERPs, spend management platforms, or AP automation tools. Backgrounds in corporate accounting or financial systems are a significant asset.&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Experience and comfort with interacting with a high volume of customers at different stages of the customer lifecycle&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;You are passionate about working with customers to ensure they achieve their goals&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Strong business acumen with a finance-first mindset and comfortable speaking the language of CFOs, Controllers, and FP&amp;amp;A teams.&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Ability to synthesize product usage data and identify key insights and trends&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Demonstrated success in cross-functional collaboration and influencing internal roadmaps based on customer needs.&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Bachelor&#39;s degree required; finance, business, or related fields preferred.&lt;/li&gt; &lt;/ul&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Bonus Points&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;ul&gt; &lt;li&gt;You think in systems, not silos, and understand the bigger picture of customer value.&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;You are energized by developing relationships across a wide range of levels and roles&lt;/li&gt; &lt;/ul&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Compensation&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;div class=&quot;css-uyf4sz&quot;&gt; &lt;div class=&quot;css-tu9sm&quot;&gt; &lt;p&gt;The expected OTE range for this role is $132,888 to $166,110. The starting wage will depend on a number of factors including the candidate’s location, skills, experience, market demands, and internal pay parity. The OTE figure listed here includes base salary and commissions, which may or may not be earned depending on performance.&amp;nbsp; Depending on the position offered, equity and other forms of compensation may be provided as part of a total compensation package.&lt;/p&gt; &lt;/div&gt; &lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;content-conclusion&quot;&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;em&gt;Please be aware, job-seekers may be at risk of targeting by malicious actors looking for personal data. Brex recruiters will only reach out via LinkedIn or email with a&amp;nbsp;&lt;a class=&quot;c-link&quot; href=&quot;http://brex.com/&quot; target=&quot;_blank&quot; data-stringify-link=&quot;http://brex.com&quot; data-sk=&quot;tooltip_parent&quot;&gt;brex.com&lt;/a&gt;&amp;nbsp;domain. Any outreach claiming to be from Brex via other sources should be ignored.&lt;/em&gt;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
title: Mid-Market Customer Success Manager

We currently require a minimum of two coordinated days in the office per week, Wednesday and Thursday. Starting February 2, 2026, we will require three days per week in office - Monday, Wednesday and Thursday. As a perk, we also have up to four weeks per year of fully remote work!&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Responsibilities&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;ul&gt; &lt;li&gt;Develop a deep expertise in Brex products to actively show customers how to become &quot;power users&quot; of the platform.&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Proactively manage an assigned book of accounts to drive customer adoption, value realization, and account growth.&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Act as a trusted advisor to finance stakeholders by providing guidance on best practices across spend management, credit policy, reconciliation workflows, and financial reporting automation.&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Build multi-threaded relationships across functional areas (Finance, Procurement, AP, IT, and Security) to increase platform stickiness and customer engagement.&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Lead business reviews&lt;strong&gt; &lt;/strong&gt;and financial health checks that drive executive alignment and showcase ROI.&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Proactively identify and mitigate churn risks through data analysis, usage insights, and issue resolution.&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Partner cross-functionally with Sales, Product, Credit, Risk, and Operations teams to deliver a seamless customer experience and advocate for product improvements.&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Consistently meet or exceed quarterly key performance metrics, including customer engagement and GMV targets.&lt;/li&gt; &lt;/ul&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Requirements&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;ul&gt; &lt;li&gt;3+ years of experience in customer-facing roles managing a book of business, owning account health, executive relationships, and expansion strategy at a high-growth start-up.&amp;nbsp;&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Deep fluency in the language of modern finance, demonstrated through hands-on experience with the ecosystem of financial technology - including ERPs, spend management platforms, or AP automation tools. Backgrounds in corporate accounting or financial systems are a significant asset.&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Experience and comfort with interacting with a high volume of customers at different stages of the customer lifecycle&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;You are passionate about working with customers to ensure they achieve their goals&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Strong business acumen with a finance-first mindset and comfortable speaking the language of CFOs, Controllers, and FP&amp;amp;A teams.&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Ability to synthesize product usage data and identify key insights and trends&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Demonstrated success in cross-functional collaboration and influencing internal roadmaps based on customer needs.&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Bachelor&#39;s degree required; finance, business, or related fields preferred.&lt;/li&gt; &lt;/ul&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Bonus Points&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;ul&gt; &lt;li&gt;You think in systems, not silos, and understand the bigger picture of customer value.&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;You are energized by developing relationships across a wide range of levels and roles&lt;/li&gt; &lt;/ul&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Compensation&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;div class=&quot;css-uyf4sz&quot;&gt; &lt;div class=&quot;css-tu9sm&quot;&gt; &lt;p&gt;The expected OTE range for this role is $132,888 to $166,110. The starting wage will depend on a number of factors including the candidate’s location, skills, experience, market demands, and internal pay parity. The OTE figure listed here includes base salary and commissions, which may or may not be earned depending on performance.&amp;nbsp; Depending on the position offered, equity and other forms of compensation may be provided as part of a total compensation package.&lt;/p&gt; &lt;/div&gt; &lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;content-conclusion&quot;&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;em&gt;Please be aware, job-seekers may be at risk of targeting by malicious actors looking for personal data. Brex recruiters will only reach out via LinkedIn or email with a&amp;nbsp;&lt;a class=&quot;c-link&quot; href=&quot;http://brex.com/&quot; target=&quot;_blank&quot; data-stringify-link=&quot;http://brex.com&quot; data-sk=&quot;tooltip_parent&quot;&gt;brex.com&lt;/a&gt;&amp;nbsp;domain. Any outreach claiming to be from Brex via other sources should be ignored.&lt;/em&gt;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
title: Mid-Market Customer Success Manager

job_description: &lt;div class=&quot;content-intro&quot;&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Why join us&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;Brex is the AI-powered spend platform. We help companies spend with confidence with integrated corporate cards, banking, and global payments, plus intuitive software for travel and expenses. Tens of thousands of companies from startups to enterprises — including DoorDash, Flexport, and Compass — use Brex to proactively control spend, reduce costs, and increase efficiency on a global scale.&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-weight: 400;&quot;&gt;Working at Brex allows you to push your limits, challenge the status quo, and collaborate with some of the brightest minds in the industry. We’re committed to building a diverse team and inclusive culture and believe your potential should only be limited by how big you can dream. We make this a reality by empowering you with the tools, resources, and support you need to grow your career.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Sales at Brex&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;The Sales team is the driving factor behind revenue for Brex and every member of our team directly affects our bottom line. We focus on generating new opportunities, acquiring new customers, and building even stronger relationships with our current customers. Our winning culture recognizes big team wins and celebrates individual accomplishments. We ensure that top performers are recognized and have built a competitive environment to motivate and unify the team.&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;What you’ll do&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;As a Mid-Market Customer Success Manager II, you will own a book of business comprised of our growing customer base, working day to day with Finance teams from CFOs to Accounting Managers to ensure they unlock the full value of Brex’s solutions. You will develop a deep proficiency in all aspects of Brex products and work cross-functionally with internal teams, including Implementation, Solutions, and Product. You’ll create and execute account strategies for customers’ business goals by leveraging product usage insights, stakeholder engagement, and cross-functional collaboration to drive product adoption, minimize churn, and grow account value.&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Where you&#39;ll work&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;This role will be based in our Salt Lake City office. We are a hybrid environment that combines the energy and connections of being in the office with the benefits and flexibility of working from home. We currently require a minimum of two coordinated days in the office per week, Wednesday and Thursday. Starting February 2, 2026, we will require three days per week in office - Monday, Wednesday and Thursday. Backgrounds in corporate accounting or financial systems are a significant asset.&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Experience and comfort with interacting with a high volume of customers at different stages of the customer lifecycle&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;You are passionate about working with customers to ensure they achieve their goals&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Strong business acumen with a finance-first mindset and comfortable speaking the language of CFOs, Controllers, and FP&amp;amp;A teams.&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Ability to synthesize product usage data and identify key insights and trends&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Demonstrated success in cross-functional collaboration and influencing internal roadmaps based on customer needs.&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Bachelor&#39;s degree required; finance, business, or related fields preferred.&lt;/li&gt; &lt;/ul&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Bonus Points&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;ul&gt; &lt;li&gt;You think in systems, not silos, and understand the bigger picture of customer value.&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;You are energized by developing relationships across a wide range of levels and roles&lt;/li&gt; &lt;/ul&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Compensation&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;div class=&quot;css-uyf4sz&quot;&gt; &lt;div class=&quot;css-tu9sm&quot;&gt; &lt;p&gt;The expected OTE range for this role is $117,600 to $147,000.
